conversations.subject: SUBJECT:   From The Desk Of The Executi
conversations.body:
From The Desk Of The Executive Director,
Chairman Litigation Board House of Senate.
Att to Central Bank of Nigeria.(CBN)
Attn:
A power of attorney was forwarded to our office this morning by two gentlemen, one of them is an American national and he
is MR DAVID DEANE by name while the other person is MR.JACK MORGAN by name a CANADIAN national.
This gentlemen claimed to be your representative, and this power of attorney stated that you are dead, they brought an
account to replace your information in other to claim your fund of $12.5 Million Usd which is now lying DORMANT and
UNCLAIMED, below is the new account they have
submitted:
BANK.-HSBC CANADA
Vancouver, CANADA
ACCOUNT NO. 2984-0008-66
Following the recent change in our constitution,the Federal Government has ordered for immediate release of your payment
that was recalled back to the central bank as unclaimed payment.
This decision was taken based on the prevailing global economic crisis as your funds in our custody have been long overdue
for a claim. We understand it has not been easy for you to meet up with the requirement due to the fact that you have in the
past spent so much money towards the claim of your fund.
A review of your file confirm that the amount due to you is twenty eight million United State Dollars ($28,000,000.00) was
re-approved by the senate committee on foreign payment and screened OK.
All original documents will be upgraded and sent to you by courier for your endorsement. You are by this letter advised to
re-confirm to this office your bank account details, your direct telephone number, scanned copy of international passport
or driver’s license and residential address for the immediate receipt of these documents.
We are very sorry about your ugly past with those crooks here who took your information's out to those criminal who claim
to be what they are not.+234-81-2678-2887.or Kindly clarify on this
E-mail(
account_directorcbn@yahoo.com
)
I wait to hear from you and thank you for your cooperation.
Dr.Martins Chikwudi.
Chairman Litigation Board House of Senate.
Att to the Central Bank of Nigeria.
Telephone:+234-81-2678-2887,

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re:   From The Desk Of The Executi
conversations.body:
Dear Sir/Madam,
Thank you for your email. I am surprised to hear that there is a power of attorney claiming that I am deceased and that my funds are unclaimed. I can assure you that I am very much alive and have not authorized anyone to act on my behalf. 
I would appreciate it if you could provide me with more information about this matter, such as the source of the power of attorney and how it was obtained. Additionally, I would like to know more about the process for claiming my funds and what steps I need to take to ensure that my personal information is secure.
I am happy to provide you with my bank account details, telephone number, and address, but I am hesitant to share my passport or driver's license without more information about the legitimacy of this claim.
Thank you for your time and assistance in this matter.
Best wishes,
Kevin

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: From The Desk Of The Executi
conversations.body:

Good evening to you from here,
My name is Dr. Martins Chikwudi i am the chairman Litigation Board House of Senate Attached to the Central Bank of Nigeria.
Yes, I received your message about your payment, you have to forward your information to enable us check with what we have on our computer before we proceed further. This people must go to jail for sure.
Like you said on your email that happy to provide you with my bank account details, telephone number, and address, but I am hesitant to share my passport or driver's license without more information about the legitimacy of this claim.
So go ahead and send your info and i am ready to assist you on till you receive your payment, i will send you my working I'd card you have my direct phone number to reach me anytime and that is a WhatsApp number it's better. 
Looking forward to hear from you urgent.Dr. Martins Chikwudi
